findings.title: Non-typical logic for `transferFrom` function
findings.description: The allowance value which is equal to `MAX_UINT` represents an unlimited allowance.

findings.title: Unlimited allowance value which is equal to `MAX_UINT`
findings.description: The contract has non-typical logic for `transferFrom` function. The allowance value which is equal to `MAX_UINT` represents an unlimited allowance.
